Body: I'm looking for a way to help lockdown an Android phone.  I want to be able to configure a phone so that only certain users can make calls/send messages to specific contacts.  It should also only allow access to specific applications, and disallow (un)installation of applications.Is there any way to do this with Android?
Title: How can I lockdown an android phone?

history.Text: I'm looking for software that can help lockdown an Android phone.  I want to be able to configure a phone so that only certain users can make calls/send messages to specific contacts.  It should also only allow access to specific applications, and disallow (un)installation of applications.Does anything like this exist for Android?
Software to lockdown an android phone
